'''''Orcrist'' 7''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Orcrist (journal)|Orcrist]]''
column2: published as a Special Issue on the Medieval Tradition in Modern Literature.

column1: The front cover features an untitled illustration by M. Cannito.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/wiwimod/index.php?page=Orcrist7|articlename=Orcrist #7|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=25 May 2012}}</ref>
